name: ROGALIK
description: Famous 2D pixel platformer in a new guise
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128 mb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
